summary: Holistic HR Professional with 5 years 7 months experience in Human Resources vertical in areas of recruitment, employee relations and performance management after completing 2 years of full time Experience

experience.title: Regional HR Manager
experience.description: Regional HR Manager responsible for entire HR function for Andhra Pradesh/Telangana states for Assets & Liabilities vertical. Led a team of two HR Executives. Handled end-to-end recruitment including sourcing, interviews, offers and onboarding; ensured payroll for new joiners; maintained new joiner, induction and offered applicants trackers; prepared recruitment MIS and reports; conducted branch visits and escalations; analyzed attrition and forecasting; maintained updated HRIS for the region; addressed employee queries; closed PMS for the financial year; issued PIP and termination letters; prepared investigation reports and acted as HR Presenter in RCU investigations; identified training needs and coordinated training; ensured goal sheet adoption and timely PMS completion.

experience.title: Employee Relationship Manager
experience.description: Conducted regular branch visits, prepared branch visit reports and maintained tracker. Handled employee grievances and queries related to policies, transfers, salaries and leaves. Managed HRIS for the region, conducted induction sessions, and handled PMS escalations. Managed performance management cycle from goal sheet updates to 360-degree feedback, normalization, and final rating in PeopleSoft. Conducted Talent Panels and ensured timely feedback.

experience.title: Recruitment Manager
experience.description: Handled recruitment for Rajasthan RBG, RIBG and GOG. End-to-end recruitment lifecycle: sourcing, interviewing, negotiating and offers till onboarding; ensured payroll inclusion for new joiners; prepared monthly recruitment reports and annual attrition/recruitment forecast; used Hirecraft for interview and candidate management; served as Center Head for mass recruitment drives and campus recruitment.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Gathered requirements from clients, sourced applicants using mass mailing and job postings, screened and lined up for interviews; coordinated salary negotiations and joining; followed up with HR departments.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering
